content.text:
The values that may be reported in the Event Type field (refer to section 5.2.12.1.14) of the event header
for events in the Persistent Event log are defined in Figure 233.

tables.title: Table_5_2_12_1_14_2_Persistent_Event_Log_Events
tables.table_md:
| Type | O/MÂ¹ | Event | Reference Section |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| 00h | | Reserved | |
| 01h | NOTE 2 | SMART / Health Log Snapshot | 5.2.12.1.14.2.1 |
| 02h | M | Firmware Commit | 5.2.12.1.14.2.2 |
| 03h | M | Timestamp Change | 5.2.12.1.14.2.3 |
| 04h | M | Power-on or Reset | 5.2.12.1.14.2.4 |
| 05h | M | NVM Subsystem Hardware Error | 5.2.12.1.14.2.5 |
| 06h | NOTE 3 | Change Namespace | 5.2.12.1.14.2.6 |
| 07h | NOTE 3 | Format NVM Start | 5.2.12.1.14.2.7 |
| 08h | NOTE 3 | Format NVM Completion | 5.2.12.1.14.2.8 |
| 09h | NOTE 3 | Sanitize Start | 5.2.12.1.14.2.9 |
| 0Ah | NOTE 3 | Sanitize Completion | 5.2.12.1.14.2.10 |
| 0Bh | O | Set Feature | 5.2.12.1.14.2.11 |
| 0Ch | O | Telemetry Log Created | 5.2.12.1.14.2.12 |
| 0Dh | O | Thermal Excursion | 5.2.12.1.14.2.13 |
| 0Eh | O | Sanitize Media Verification Event | 5.2.12.1.14.2.14 |
| 0Fh | O | Configurable Device Personality Change Event | 5.2.12.1.14.2.15 |
| 10h to DDh | | Reserved | |
| DEh | O | Vendor Specific Event | 5.2.12.1.14.2.16 |
| DFh | O | TCG Defined | 5.2.12.1.14.2.17 |
| E0h to FFh | | Reserved | |
| Notes: | | | |
| 1. | O/M definition: O = Optional, M = Mandatory. | | |
| 2. | Mandatory for NVMe over PCIe implementations. Optional for NVMe over Fabrics implementations. | | |
| 3. | Mandatory if the command used to initiate the activity reported by the event is supported. | | |
